# Demo Shop Workspace Instructions

This workspace contains a full-stack e-commerce demo shop with React frontend and Node.js backend.

## Project Structure
- Backend: Node.js + Express + MongoDB
- Frontend: React with local storage cart
- 4 product categories with 6 items each
- Custom coffee builder with configurable options
